articles.title: Covid: Glimmer of Christmas hope on Omicron, says Jenny Harries - BBC News
articles.description: But it is too early to downgrade the serious threat posed by the new variant, says Dr Jenny Harries.
articles.content:
By Hamish MackayBBC News
Official findings that Omicron may be less likely to result in serious illness than Delta offer a "glimmer of Christmas hope", the head of the UK Health Security Agency has â€¦ [+5500 chars]
